scripts.build:draco: cd cpp && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.build:entt: cd cpp/entt && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.solvespace:web: cd cpp/solvespace && cmake --preset web && cmake --build --preset web
scripts.draco:web: cd cpp/draco && cmake --preset web && cmake --build --preset web
scripts.draco:pc: cd cpp/draco && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.draco:pc:app1: cd cpp/draco/app1 && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.cad:web: cd cpp/cad && cmake --preset web-deformation && cmake --build --preset web-deformation
scripts.bgfx:web: cd cpp/bgfx && cmake --preset web && cmake --build --preset web
scripts.bgfx:pc: cd cpp/bgfx && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.entt:pc: cd cpp/entt && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
scripts.ogl:pc: cd cpp/opengl && cmake --preset release && cmake --build --preset release
